sub_title: Amstelveen City Councilor, Project manager and Diaspora  development and Humanitarian Responce Advocate
summary: Strategic and result-oriented Diaspora professional. Experienced NGO leader, development program manager and organisation development advisor. Builder with attention for social interactions and with an eye for establishing connections between people and organizations. I can switch well between different levels. Main areas: As Trainer Project Management, Financial management, program leadership, Governance, and as consultant/advisor on refugees and diaspora.

'description': "Diaspora Solutions is a consulting and advisory organisation that aims to bring the African Diaspora Professionals in Europe especially African in the  Netherlands to put to use their full professional capacity in their host country and their countries of origin. It is evident that the majority of African migrants professionals are not able to adequately put their professional skills to maximum use. Hence Diaspora Solutions,  brings together such professionals from different countries and engage them in the best ways possible for the development of their host country and their countries of origin.

What we do
With our diverse professional backgrounds, we have a wide range of professional to tap into their knowledge and expertise.

We focus on experts in the following areas:

Consultancy and Advisory   

Our experienced experts and professionals can help you but not limited to:
•	Migration issues including refugees
•	Diaspora investment  
•	Consultancy on Business Plans for Businesses 
•	Monitoring and Evaluation of development project
•	Representations of company and organizations.

Our Targets
Governments, Companies, Organizations, diaspora, and African diaspora individuals,  

Training
We offer training sessions for both individuals and groups on the following services:
Our services include the following but not limited to:
•	Project management
•	Leadership
•	Financial management NGO's
•	Volunteers management
•	Financial Literacy 
•	Aggression training
